Description:
marshmallow justiceÂ is the second opening theme of the Nisemonogatari anime. It was performed by Eri Kitamura, who voices Karen Araragi. During the TV broadcast, it was featured on Karen Bee: Part 2, Part 5 & Part 6. During the home media release, its usage was expanded to Karen Bee: Part 4 & Part 7.
It's also featured in Episode 06 of Koyomimonogatari.

#Notes.text: The melody for this opening also appears in the song "Niichan. Atoha Makaseta" which plays in Karen Bee: Part 7.
